Control Name: 4.13. Ensure 'Enforce SSL connection' is set to 'ENABLED' for PostgreSQL Database Server
Control Statement: Enforcing SSL connections between database server and client applications helps protect against man in the middle attacks by encrypting the data stream between the server and application.
